feed.title: blank
feed.subtitle: A simple, whitespace theme for academics. Based on [*folio](https://github.com/bogoli/-folio) design.

entry.title: working
entry.content:
“How to Do Great Work” by Paul Graham is a great read and guide that I try to adhere to.

My work style and communication preferences - coming soon.

entry.title: reading
entry.content:
I would love to share some of my reading recommendations with you. These texts have shaped me in one way or another, challenging my pre-existing mindsets and notions about our relationships and the world around us.

  • essays
  • poem
  • self growth
  • fiction
  • nonfiction

  • “How to Do Great Work,” Paul Graham

  • “The Wasteland,” TS Eliot
    타인의 시선을 의식해 힘든 나에게, 글배우

  • Atomic Habits, James Clear

  • All the Light We Cannot See, Anthony Doerr
    The Paper Menagerie, Ken Liu
    Einstein’s Dreams, Alan Lightman
    Ninth House, Leigh Bardugo

  • Smoke Gets in Your Eyes, Caitlin Doughty
